alert.note: Alert for Haywood (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 4:22PM EDT until May 27 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Pigeon River At Canton affecting Haywood County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pigeon River At Canton. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water may approach the yards of some homes on and near Fiberville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 11/19/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp The next statement should be issued late tonight before 430 AM EDT.
